MItools 0.1.38
  • Reference

Merge data.table to GRanges metadata

merge2GRangesmcols.Rd

Merge data.table to GRanges metadata

merge2GRangesmcols(range, datatable, by.x = c("query", "interacts_with"),
  by.y = c("IDs_interactor_viral", "IDs_interactor_human"))

Arguments

range

a path to a tsv (txt) file containing QSLIMFinder (SLIMFinder) occurence output
datatable

a path to a tsv (txt) file containing QSLIMFinder (SLIMFinder) main output
one_from_cloud

pick only one motif per motif cloud by the lowest p-value (before multiple hypothesis testing correction)

Value

Genomic Ranges object containing QSLIMFinder (SLIMFinder) occurence output

See also

ELMdb2GRanges, SLIMFinderOcc2GRanges

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
